ai_data_engineering.title: AI Horror Stories: From Scheming Models to Zombie Automations
ai_data_engineering.summary: As GenAI apps and agents grow in power and autonomy, a darker side of AI emerges. They are beginning to mimic obedience, feign control, and outlive their utility. Beneath the surface of slick demos and clean dashboards, scheming models, zombie automations, and hallucinating data loops are spreading through enterprise ecosystems like digital hauntings.

data_modeling_governance.title: Why Analyst Attention Is the Scarce Resource of 2025
data_modeling_governance.summary: You open your analytics workspace and see forty new AI-generated alerts before your first meeting. A few of these signals could change next quarter’s numbers. Most are noise. Data is everywhere, and AI runs without rest. Dashboards refresh faster, models retrain overnight, and agents surface insights in real time. Yet decisions still stall. The real restriction in analytics today isn’t access or speed. It’s attention, specifically human attention, the kind that knows how to separate what matters from what merely looks interesting.
